title: Cycle Helmet Font.
content:
Hi,

If somebody could identify this font for me it'd save me a great deal of trouble! Happy identifying :) It's the Ergoride font on the side of the helmet.

[http://www.mavic.com/en/product/helmets/helmets/helmets/Plasma#328455](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823123636/http:/www.mavic.com/en/product/helmets/helmets/helmets/Plasma#328455 "http://www.mavic.com/en/product/helmets/helmets/helmets/Plasma#328455")

Thanks!
author: Joe-Mason
